attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Everybody knows that Mugabe's goverment has destroyed one of the most powerful economies in Africa, he has commited a huge crime by subjecting his people to such conditions. To have Zimbabwe governed on such a basis is an embarrassment to our own goverment and her majesty. We need to show the world we are not a country about attacking defenceless countries for oil but a country prepared to fight for whats right in this world. We beg of you prime minister to invade Zimbabwe and bring Mugabe's reign of tierney to end for good.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
